enumerations.name: DataConsistencyPolicyEnum
enumerations.note: Defines how data consistency is ensured in the cross cluster communication. Aggregated by DataComProps.dataConsistencyPolicy

literals.name: consistencyMechanism
literals.description:
In this case the data consistency is ensured by the implementation of the SwClucC module.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: noConsistency
literals.description:
In this case the data consistency is not ensured by the SwClucC module. In this case it has to be Mechanism ensured by scheduling.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: SendIndicationEnum
enumerations.note: This meta-class provides a way to specify in which way redundancy shall be applied on collection level. Aggregated by DataComProps.sendIndication

literals.name: anySendOperation
literals.description:
This value represents the requirement that any send operation of the Software Cluster is indicated.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

literals.name: none
literals.description:
This value represents the requirement that send operations of the Software Cluster are not indicated.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1
